mapper.insert: insert into tb_admin (Aid, Account, Password, Email, Privilege, Arid, Sid, Del, CreateTime, ChangeTime, DelTime) values (#{aid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{privilege,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{arid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{del,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{changetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tb_admin set Account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Privilege = #{privilege,jdbcType=CHAR}, Arid = #{arid,jdbcType=CHAR}, Sid = #{sid,jdbcType=CHAR}, Del = #{del,jdbcType=CHAR}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ChangeTime = #{changetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DelTime = #{deltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where Aid = #{aid,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select Aid, Account, Password, Email, Privilege, Arid, Sid, Del, CreateTime, ChangeTime, DelTime from tb_admin where Aid = #{aid,jdbcType=CHAR}
select Aid, Account, Password, Email, Privilege, Arid, Sid, Del, CreateTime, ChangeTime, DelTime from tb_admin
